duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the annual allocation of wind turbines and subcomponents across North American wind portfolio.
Optimize fulfilment and sourcing plan for wind projects by coordinating with various teams.
Manage material allocation and logistical activities to support wind turbine deliveries.
Maintain the North America Allocation Model file and support the transition to the Renewables Transportation Management (RenTM) System.
Provide continual guidance to ensure optimal fulfilment of wind turbine project demand.
Identify opportunities for improvement and drive improvements in logistics portfolio.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Statistics, Business Administration, Supply Chain and Logistics, or Data Analytics (Master's preferred)
